name: Bastion
desc: Bastion champions gain Armor and Magic Resist. This is increased by 100% for the first 10 seconds of combat.

name: Bruiser
desc: Your units gain 100 Health. Bruisers gain additional maximum Health.

levels.desc: When Aatrox or the holder of the Darkin Blade dies, the Darkin Blade is equipped to the nearest ally champion, granting them 400 Health and 15% Omnivamp. After being equipped to a champion for 5 seconds, Aatrox will revive upon their death instead.

name: Deadeye
desc: Innate: +1 Range Every 3 seconds, Deadeyes attack the enemy with the highest percent Health and deal bonus damage.

name: Demacia
desc: Your strongest Demacians become Elite and equip a random Radiant item each combat. Elites grant Armor and Magic Resist to themselves and adjacent allies, but this does not stack.

levels.desc: When Bel'Veth kills an enemy, they leave behind Void Coral that she will consume. The first Coral increases her max Health by 50%, while further Coral heals her 20% maximum Health. When a Void Coral is consumed, she deals 10% maximum Health as magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes.

name: Freljord
desc: After 8 seconds, an ice storm strikes the battlefield. Enemies take a percentage of their maximum Health as true damage and gain debuffs. Sunder: Reduce Armor Shred: Reduce Magic Resist Mana Reave: Increase max Mana until the next cast

levels.desc: 5% Health, enemies are 40% Sundered and Shredded for 10 seconds
10% Health, enemies are also 35% Mana Reaved
15% Health, enemies are also stunned for 1.5 seconds

name: Gunner
desc: When Gunner champions attack, they gain bonus Attack Damage, up to 8 stacks.

name: Invoker
desc: Every 3 seconds, your units gain Mana.

levels.desc: 20 Mana to all, additional 15 to Invokers

name: Ionia
desc: Each Ionian has a unique bonus within their Ability. Every 4 seconds, a number of Ionians are enlightened to their spirit form, gaining 20 Mana and doubling stat bonuses for 4 seconds.

name: Noxus
desc: Noxus champions gain Health, Ability Power and Attack Damage. This is increased by 10% for each different opponent that either you have conquered in combat or is dead.

name: Piltover
desc: Gain the T-Hex. Every time you lose a player combat, the T-Hex gains Charges. Winning converts the Charges to Power for the T-Hex. You may also sell the T-Hex if it has any Power, resetting the T-Hex and converting its Power to loot.

levels.desc: Gain bonus loot every round. Each loss counts as 2 losses instead.
Whenever an ally gains a Shield, grant them 8% stacking Attack Speed for the rest of combat.
When a Rogue falls below 50% Health, they briefly become untargetable and dash to an enemy within 4 hexes (preferring enemy backline).
Additionally, a Rogue's first attack on an enemy bleeds them for 30% of their max Health as magic damage over 5 seconds.

name: Shurima
desc: Every 4 seconds, Shuriman heal 5% maximum Health. After 8 seconds, select Shuriman Ascend and gain 30% max Health and 45% Attack Speed.

levels.desc: All Ascend at the Start of Combat

name: Slayer
desc: Slayers gain 15% Omnivamp. Slayers deal bonus damage, doubled against units below 60% Health.

name: Sorcerer
desc: Sorcerers gain bonus Ability Power. When an enemy dies after being damaged by a Sorcerer, they deal a percentage of that enemy's maximum Health to another enemy.

levels.desc: 80 Ability Power; 12% max Health to 2 enemies
120 Ability Power; 20% max Health to 2 enemies

name: Targon
desc: All your unit's healing and shielding is improved.

name: Void
desc:
Get a placeable void egg. At the start of combat, it hatches into an unspeakable horror and knocks up adjacent enemies. Each Void star level increases the horror's Health and Ability Power by 25%.
Void Remora

levels.desc: Ryze's spell changes depending on the Region Portal playrs voted for at the start of the game.

name: Yordle
desc: Your units gain 10% Attack Speed per star level. If you have 3-star champions, your Yordles can become 4-star, which gives their Ability a wacky upgrade!

name: Zaun
desc: Zaun champions create random chem-mods that only they can use. Champions can be modded once, and mods can only be removed by selling the champion.
